I'm new to using JUnit and starting setting up tests for a parser.

I want to load a text file that contains data to test. Currently, I have
static ArrayLists in my TestCase class. In the setUp method, I check if
those ArrayLists are null, and if they are, load the test data. So, I only
load the test data once but it seems messy to have test data loaded for the
whole suite in a method intended to setup a single test method. I guess this
data loading can be moved to the suite() method?

However, I still have to hardcode the name of the data file. The TestCase
class has a main method and I tried passing the test file name as an
argument to that however that simply runs TestRunner which creates a new
instance of the TestCase and undoes my data loading. Is there a way to pass
the name of the data file as an argument to TestRunner so it can be loaded
when TestRunner calls suite()?

If not, I guess I'm looking for a setUp method for suites as well as test
methods.

thx for any help

Andy Kriger
